mapper.select: select CASE WHEN opp.IMAGE_URL_LIST IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN opp.IMAGE_URL IS NULL THEN ( SELECT CASE WHEN IMAGE_URL_LIST IS NULL THEN IMAGE_URL ELSE IMAGE_URL_LIST END image FROM OLO_PD_PRODUCT oppt WHERE oppt.code = A .CODE AND ROWNUM = 1 ) ELSE opp.IMAGE_URL END ELSE opp.IMAGE_URL_LIST END IMAGE_URL_LIST, "ORDER_ID", "USER_ID", "SKU_ID", "CODE", "TITLE", "NUMBER", "PRICE", "to_char( A.CREATE_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') CREATE_TIME , a."CREATION_PEOPLE_ID", to_char( A.UPDATE_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') UPDATE_TIME , "UPDATE_PEOPLE_ID", "SPREAD1", "SPREAD2", "SPREAD3", "SPREAD4", "SPREAD5", "ID" from "OLO_PD_ORDER_DETAILS" LEFT JOIN OLO_PD_SKU ops on OPS.PRODUCT_CODE = a.CODE LEFT JOIN OLO_PD_PRODUCT opp on opp.goods_id = ops.goods_id --LEFT JOIN OLO_PD_PRODUCT opp on opp.CODE = a.CODE where "ID" = #{ID}
